name: 8th International Conference on Chemical Engineering
content: 8th International Conference on Chemical Engineering (CHEME 2024) March 23 \~ 24, 2024, Sydney, Australia https://meche2024.org/cheme/index Scope 8th International Conference on Chemical Engineering (CHEME 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications impacts and challenges of Chemical Engineering. The conference documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of Chemical Engineering. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field. Original research papers, state-of-the-art reviews are invited for publication in all areas Chemical Engineering. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Analytical Chemistry • Biological Chemistry • Biotechnology and Bio-Systems Engineering • Catalysis / Synthesis • Catalysis and Reaction Engineering • Energy • Environment • Environmental Chemistry • Materials Engineering/Nanotechnology/Polymer • Materials, Polymers & Nanoscience • Organic Chemistry • Physical Chemistry / Chemical Physics • Process Systems Engineering • Theoretical and Computational Chemistry • Transport, Colloids and Interface Science Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by March 09, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Advances in Chemistry (IJAC) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from CHEME 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • Chemical Engineering : An International Journal (CEIJ) Important Dates • Submission Deadline: March 09, 2024 • Authors Notification: March 16, 2024 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due March 19, 2024 Contact us Here's where you can reach us: cheme@meche2024.org (or) chemeconf@gmail.com
